This comprehensive course covers the latest advancements in deep learning and artificial intelligence using Python. Designed for both beginner and advanced students, this course teaches you the foundational concepts and practical skills necessary to build and deploy deep learning models.

Module 1: Introduction to Python and Deep Learning

  • Overview of Python programming language

  • Introduction to deep learning and neural networks

Module 2: Neural Network Fundamentals

  • Understanding activation functions, loss functions, and optimization techniques

  • Overview of supervised and unsupervised learning

Module 3: Building a Neural Network from Scratch

  • Hands-on coding exercise to build a simple neural network from scratch using Python

Module 4: TensorFlow 2.0 for Deep Learning

  • Overview of TensorFlow 2.0 and its features for deep learning

  • Hands-on coding exercises to implement deep learning models using TensorFlow

Module 5: Advanced Neural Network Architectures

  • Study of different neural network architectures such as feedforward, recurrent, and convolutional networks

  • Hands-on coding exercises to implement advanced neural network models

Module 6: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)

  • Overview of convolutional neural networks and their applications

  • Hands-on coding exercises to implement CNNs for image classification and object detection tasks

Module 7: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs)

  • Overview of recurrent neural networks and their applications

  • Hands-on coding exercises to implement RNNs for sequential data such as time series and natural language processing


By the end of this course, you will have a strong understanding of deep learning and its applications in AI, and the ability to build and deploy deep learning models using Python and TensorFlow 2.0. This course will be a valuable asset for anyone looking to pursue a career in AI or simply expand their knowledge in this exciting field.
targetAudiences: Data scientists, analysts, and engineers who want to expand their knowledge and skills in machine learning.
Developers and programmers who want to learn how to build and deploy machine learning models in a production environment.
Researchers and academics who want to understand the latest developments and applications of machine learning.
Business professionals and managers who want to learn how to apply machine learning to solve real-world problems in their organizations.
Students and recent graduates who want to gain a solid foundation in machine learning and pursue a career in data science or artificial intelligence.
Anyone who is curious about machine learning and wants to learn more about its applications and how it is used in the industry.

courseDetails.title: Mastering 2D and 3D Rotations: A Mathematical Odyssey
courseDetails.shortDescription: 3D and 2D Rotations
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Mastering 2D and 3D Rotations: A Mathematical Odyssey," a captivating journey into the fundamental principles of rotation in two and three-dimensional spaces. Whether you're an aspiring game developer seeking to enhance your understanding of spatial transformations or simply someone intrigued by the elegance of mathematical concepts, this introductory course is designed to illuminate the art and science of rotations.

In the realm of computer graphics, robotics, animation, and game development, the concept of rotation is omnipresent. It's the magic behind the seamless movement of characters, the realistic rendering of objects, and the precise positioning of elements in 2D and 3D environments. Understanding rotations isn't just a technical skill; it's a gateway to unlocking the full potential of these creative and technological fields.

Our journey begins by delving deep into the heart of rotations through the lens of transformation matrices. These mathematical constructs serve as our compass, guiding us through the intricate world of rotations. You'll discover how a simple set of equations can transform an ordinary point, a line, a triangle, or even a complex object like a cube into new orientations with astonishing precision.

But this course is not just about abstract mathematics. We understand that to truly grasp the power of rotations, you need hands-on experience. That's why we've incorporated interactive simulations that bring these concepts to life. Through these simulations, you'll have the opportunity to see, feel, and manipulate the effects of rotations in real-time. This practical experience will solidify your understanding and equip you with the skills needed to apply rotations in practical scenarios.

As you progress through the course, you'll witness the elegance and universality of rotation mathematics. You'll uncover the connections between 2D and 3D rotations, bridging the gap between these seemingly distinct realms.

Whether you're a game engine developer seeking to optimize performance or simply a curious mind eager to explore the beauty of mathematical transformations, "Mastering 2D and 3D Rotations" promises to be an enlightening and enriching experience. Join us on this odyssey into the world of rotations, and let's embark on a journey that will forever change the way you perceive space and movement.
targetAudiences: This course is designed for aspiring game developers seeking to enhance their understanding of rotation in 2D and 3D spaces.
It's ideal for mathematicians and enthusiasts eager to explore the elegant concepts behind spatial transformations.
Computer graphics and animation enthusiasts will find valuable insights into the mechanics of object manipulation and orientation.
Anyone interested in mastering the art of rotations in both 2D and 3D realms can benefit from this course.

courseDetails.title: Venom Introduction Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Getting Started with the Venom Blockchain
courseDetails.longDescription:
Venom is a multi-blockchain network that functions as the basis for scalable Web3 applications in the DeFi and Global Payments markets. The Venom blockchain offers many benefits, making it an attractive choice for users and developers. It is a safe place for everyone to build their blockchain-based solutions and conduct transactions securely and efficiently.

The Venom blockchain is a community-driven network that empowers participants to shape the ecosystem's future. The network's success depends on the engagement and contributions of its users, validators, and developers. Members work together to advance the ecosystem by hosting events, contributing to network development, and ensuring the platform's security and governance.

This course is designed as an entry point into the Venom universe. Students will get to know the technology behind the scalability of the Venom blockchain and will be given resources that enable them to get started on the Venom blockchain.

The course will introduce students to Venom, provide an overview of the network architecture of Venom, its consensus model, and walk students through the first steps of interacting with the Venom blockchain.

Course outline


  • What is Venom?

  • Venom Blockchain Architecture

  • Consensus Mechanism of the Venom Blockchain

  • Creating a Venom Wallet

  • First steps with Venom

The course will also take a look at $VENOM, the native currency of the Venom network.
targetAudiences: Web3 Enthusiasts
Venom Community Members

courseDetails.title: Graphics and UI Design with- Adobe XD and Illustrator
courseDetails.shortDescription: Create User Interface for Apps and Design Vector Graphics
courseDetails.longDescription:
In this course, you will learn about Designing User Interface with Adobe XD and Designing Vector Graphics with Adobe Illustrator. Here you will learn various tools and techniques used in the process of creating user interface and workflow for the Mobile app. User Experience Designing is a crucial step in overall application development cycle, being the early stage, it allows core team of designers, managers and developers to visualize the application with a prototype. It enables them to make sufficient changes in the UI before the code development and testing begins.

Working in the Adobe ecosystem allows its users to easily integrate with other Adobe CC software such as Photoshop and Illustrator.

What is Adobe XD?

Adobe XD is an industry recognized Designing software used for creating Design prototypes and wireframes for the Mobile applications and Websites. It is used for visualizing complete User Interface by designing individual components that lead to a overall improved User Experience.

This training would give you insight into how the interface works, all the main tools and features, and the most common shortcuts which will dramatically increase your productivity. Here you will learn how you can give life to your design and create a working prototype directly within Adobe XD, without the need of any third-party software.

In Adobe XD, you will learn to-

  • Create Photo gallery with thumbnails using Repeat Grid

  • Create toggle button using component states

  • Designing and Prototyping Left Navigation panel

  • Create a prototype and auto animate

  • Designing Status and Navigation bar

What is Adobe Illustrator?

Adobe Illustrator is a vector graphics editor and design program developed by Adobe Systems and used by Creative Artists, Graphics Designers, Vector Artists, Animators, Students and others. But it is also widely used by Hobbyists and Illustrator enthusiasts.

In Adobe Illustrator you will be learning some Graphics Design tools and techniques such as-

  • Joining and combining different shapes with Shape builder

  • Creating Cloud, Mechanical Tools

  • Various editing tools such as width, knife, Envelop Distort

  • Creating Photo Masks

  • Effects such as 3D Extrude and Bevel

  • Area type tool

  • Isometric and Perspective Illustration
targetAudiences: This course is for anyone who is interested to learn Adobe XD for Designing User Interface
Students, Graphics Designers and Creative professionals looking to learn some tools and techniques in Adobe Illustrator

Course outline
